description: Returns information about a commit, including commit message and committer information.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository to which the commit was made.

parameters.name: commitId
parameters.description: The commit ID. Commit IDs are the full SHA ID of the commit.

nested_items.name: commitId
nested_items.description: The full SHA ID of the specified commit.

nested_items.name: treeId
nested_items.description: Tree information for the specified commit.

nested_items.name: parents
nested_items.description: A list of parent commits for the specified commit. Each parent commit ID is the full commit ID.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The commit message associated with the specified commit.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the user who made the specified commit.

nested_items.name: email
nested_items.description: The email address associated with the user who made the commit, if any.

nested_items.name: date
nested_items.description: The date when the specified commit was commited, in timestamp format with GMT offset.

nested_items.name: committer
nested_items.description: Information about the person who committed the specified commit, also known as the committer. Information includes the date in timestamp format with GMT offset, the name of the committer, and the email address for the committer, as configured in Git.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the user who made the specified commit.

nested_items.name: email
nested_items.description: The email address associated with the user who made the commit, if any.

nested_items.name: date
nested_items.description: The date when the specified commit was commited, in timestamp format with GMT offset.

nested_items.name: additionalData
nested_items.description: Any other data associated with the specified commit.
